mapper.insert: INSERT INTO student (student_id, class_name, phone, email, user_id, gender) VALUES (#{studentNumber}, #{className}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{userId}, #{gender})
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET student_id = #{studentNumber}, class_name = #{className}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender} WHERE id = #{id}
